## BaseRequest interface

Shared parameters for each Request

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BaseRequest 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [accessToken](./stentor-models.baserequest.accesstoken.md) | string | Access token from account linking |
|  [anonymous](./stentor-models.baserequest.anonymous.md) | boolean | The user is anonymous, or a guest.<!-- -->The user either does not yet have a verified identity or have chosen to not have any data saved about them. |
|  [apiAccess](./stentor-models.baserequest.apiaccess.md) | [ApiAccessData](./stentor-models.apiaccessdata.md) | API access data from the platform In case there is an APIs that provides services like list management, messaging... |
|  [deviceId](./stentor-models.baserequest.deviceid.md) | string | Unique identifier provided by the channel for the user's current device. |
|  [isBargeIn](./stentor-models.baserequest.isbargein.md) | boolean | Is the request a barge in<!-- -->Currently only set on Google and Dialogflow request |
|  [isHealthCheck](./stentor-models.baserequest.ishealthcheck.md) | boolean | Is the request a health check.<!-- -->Currently only Google and Dialogflow perform health checks. |
|  [isNewSession](./stentor-models.baserequest.isnewsession.md) | boolean | Is the request a new session. |
|  [locale](./stentor-models.baserequest.locale.md) | [Locale](./stentor-models.locale.md) | User's locale, such as us-EN and es-MX.<!-- -->Possible values for Alexa are defined here: https://developer.amazon.com/docs/custom-skills/request-and-response-json-reference.html\#request-locale Possible values for Dialogflow are defined here: https://dialogflow.com/docs/reference/language |
|  [overrideKey](./stentor-models.baserequest.overridekey.md) | string | Used during forwarding and redirecting the request to another handler. When set it pulls content or paths for this key instead of for the request. |
|  [platform](./stentor-models.baserequest.platform.md) | string | The platform the request came from |
|  [rawQuery](./stentor-models.baserequest.rawquery.md) | string | Raw speech to text (STT) query, not available on all platforms. |
|  [type](./stentor-models.baserequest.type.md) | [RequestTypes](./stentor-models.requesttypes.md) | Type of the request. |
|  [userId](./stentor-models.baserequest.userid.md) | string | ID for the user making the request. |
